home.title: Welcome to Yassline Tour

home.subtitleDescription: Premium travel experiences designed to create unforgettable memories
home.discoverRoutes: Discover the most incredible routes in Morocco. Adventures designed to create unique memories.

transport.title: Transport Services
transport.heroSubtitle: Airports, Stations and On-Demand Service. Luxury experience on every journey.
transport.servicesDescription: Transport solutions adapted to your needs. From airport transfers to intercity trips.
transport.noServicesAvailable: No transport services available at this time
transport.popularRatesDescription: Most requested routes with transparent prices. Book your transfer in seconds.
transport.noRoutesAvailable: No routes available at this time
transport.contactForQuote: Contact us to get a custom quote
transport.hourlyDescription: Rent a vehicle with driver by the hour
transport.intercityServiceDescription: Connect the main cities of Morocco with comfort, safety and style. Our inter-city service offers you the best travel experience between destinations, ideal for business trips, tourism or any travel you need.
transport.comfortableTravelDescription: Luxury Mercedes-Benz vehicles with all amenities
transport.professionalDriversDescription: Experienced drivers familiar with the routes
transport.flexibleScheduleDescription: We adapt the schedule to your specific needs
transport.bestPriceDescription: Competitive rates with discounts for long distances
transport.mainCitiesDescription: We connect Marrakech, Casablanca, Fez, Rabat, Tangier, Agadir and all the main cities of Morocco. We calculate the price automatically based on distance and selected vehicle type.
transport.airportServiceDescription: Our airport transfer service offers you a comfortable and safe travel experience to and from all international airports in Morocco. Available 24/7 with luxury Mercedes-Benz vehicles and professional drivers.
transport.fixedPriceDescription: 40‚Ç¨ for transfers to the airport city
transport.fullAssistanceDescription: Luggage assistance and sign with your name
transport.availability247Description: Our service is available every day of the year, 24 hours a day. Whenever you arrive, our driver will be waiting for you with a smile and ready to take you to your destination.
transport.completeFlightData: Complete your flight and destination details
transport.specialRequirementsPlaceholder: E.g: Baby seat, accessibility, airport waiting...
transport.whatIncludes: What does our airport service include?
transport.includesDriverSign: Driver with sign with your name
transport.customizeExperience: Customize your experience according to your needs
transport.indicatePickup: Indicate where you want us to pick you up
transport.hourlyServiceDescription: Our hourly service allows you to rent a vehicle with a professional driver for as long as you need. The service includes professional driver, luxury Mercedes-Benz vehicle, travel insurance and all premium services.
transport.supplementsDescription: For short services we apply supplements that reflect the preparation and availability of the vehicle and driver:
transport.customServiceDescription: Create your own itinerary. We help you design the perfect trip according to your needs.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner to discover Morocco with style and comfort

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: Yassline Tour was born from the passion to showcase the beauty and cultural richness of Morocco. With years of experience in the tourism sector, we have become a reference in luxury transportation services and personalized tourist circuits.
ourStory.paragraph2: Our team consists of local professionals with deep knowledge of routes, culture, and Moroccan traditions. Every trip we organize is designed to offer a unique and unforgettable experience.
ourStory.paragraph3: Since our beginnings, we have been committed to offering the highest quality services, using state-of-the-art Mercedes-Benz vehicles and guaranteeing maximum safety and comfort for our clients.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide each of our services

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: We build lasting relationships based on transparency and commitment to our clients.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We only use high-end vehicles and maintain the highest service standards.

service.title: Personalized Service
service.description: Every trip is tailored to the specific needs and preferences of our clients.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We love what we do and it shows in every detail of our services.

features.title: Why Choose Us?
features.subtitle: Discover the advantages of traveling with Yassline Tour
features.experience: Years of experience in tourism in Morocco

cta.title: Ready for Your Adventure?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today and start planning your perfect trip to Morocco

footer.brandDescription: Your trusted partner to discover Morocco with style and comfort.

payment.title: Payment Method

cash.name: Cash
cash.description: Pay in cash at pickup time

bank_transfer.name: Bank Transfer
bank_transfer.description: Make a bank transfer to our account

binance.name: Binance Pay
binance.description: Pay with cryptocurrencies using Binance Pay

redotpay.name: Redotpay
redotpay.description: Secure payment with card or transfer

moneygram.name: MoneyGram
moneygram.description: Fast and secure international money transfer

bankTransfer.title: Bank Transfer Information
bankTransfer.instructions: Make the transfer and upload the proof to confirm your payment

binance.title: Pay with Binance Pay
binance.instructions: Scan the QR code or send the amount to the indicated wallet address

redotpay.title: Pay with Redotpay
redotpay.instructions: You will be redirected to Redotpay's secure payment page

moneygram.title: Pay with MoneyGram
moneygram.instructions: Complete the MoneyGram transfer with the provided information and mark as paid when you have completed the transaction
moneygram.note: Once the transfer is completed, mark as paid and our team will review the payment within a maximum of 48 hours

cash.title: Cash Payment
cash.instructions: You will pay in cash at pickup time. The driver will confirm the payment.
cash.note: Note: Payment must be made at pickup time

cashPayment.message: You will pay in cash to the driver at pickup time
cashPayment.note: The driver will confirm the payment when picking you up

payment.paymentInReview: Your payment is being reviewed by administration. You will receive a notification when it is confirmed.
payment.successMessage: Your payment has been processed successfully
payment.cancelledMessage: The payment process was cancelled. No charge has been made.
